products.title: Horizon Stone Roman Blind
products.description: What a stunning ombre design. This horizon stone roman blind does everything right. Blending gorgeous neutral tones to create a graduated watercolour border, it's incredibly contemporary and stylish. How easy it will be to complement this blind with the rest of your decor. products.title: Horizon Blush Roman Blind
products.description: Add a touch of contemporary style to your home with this stunning horizon blush roman blind. The gorgeous ombre pattern runs from dark to light to create a stunning border across the bottom of your blind. The combination of on trend powder pink and a creamy fabric means you can a add a touch of contemporary style to your home with this stunning horizon blush roman blind.
